metadata.Title: CVE-2012-5619 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: The Sleuth Kit (TSK) 4.0.1 does not properly handle "." (dotfile) filesystem entries in FAT file systems and other file systems for which . isnot a reserved name, which allows local users to hide activities it moredifficult to conduct forensics activities, as demonstrated by Flame.

criterions.comment: sleuthkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
